episodes.title: The Art of Cults: A Masterclass in Mind Manipulation
episodes.description: In episode 12, we dive headfirst into the twisted world of brainwashing, radicalization, and cults. Examining MAGA, QAnon, and the Barbs, we unpack the intricate ways in which online platforms become breeding grounds for cult-like beliefs. We then delve into Nicki Minaj's recent 7 day meltdown over feuding with Megan Thee Stallion, using her as the ultimate crash course in narcissism and weaponizing a fan base with nefarious intent.  Lastly, we explore the Netflix documentary "Surviving Twin Flames," exposing a cult that manipulates its members through spiritual ideologies and cognitive therapy. Join us for an intriguing exploration of the dark corners where brainwashing and echo chambers converge.   Artwork: “No More Idols” - Smoke (2024)  Veli: https://linktr.ee/Velitheartist   Smoke: https://linktr.ee/Smokezart   Instagram: www.instagram.com/theartofdiscourse
